001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.allure;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.json.JsonPathExtractor;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.validator.QueryResponseValidatorImpl;
005import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
006import java.util.Map;
007import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
008
009/**
010 * Enhances {@code QueryResponseValidatorImpl} with Allure reporting.
011 *
012 * <p>This class extends {@link QueryResponseValidatorImpl} to integrate Allure
013 * logging, ensuring query validation details are captured in test reports.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017@Component
018public class QueryResponseValidatorAllureImpl extends QueryResponseValidatorImpl {
019
020   /**
021    * Constructs a new {@code QueryResponseValidatorAllureImpl} with the given JSON Path extractor.
022    *
023    * @param jsonPathExtractor The {@link JsonPathExtractor} used for extracting values from query responses.
024    */
025   public QueryResponseValidatorAllureImpl(final JsonPathExtractor jsonPathExtractor) {
026      super(jsonPathExtractor);
027   }
028
029   /**
030    * Logs the validation target using Allure reporting.
031    *
032    * <p>This method overrides the parent implementation to add Allure step-based logging,
033    * ensuring that validation details are included in the test execution report.
034    *
035    * @param data The extracted response data mapped to assertion keys.
036    */
037   @Override
038   protected void printAssertionTarget(final Map<String, Object> data) {
039      super.printAssertionTarget(data);
040      Allure.step("Validating query response with " + data.size() + " assertion(s)", () ->
041            Allure.addAttachment("Data to be validated", data.toString()));
042   }
043}
